title: RecordIsTombstone Predicate
description: Configuration schema for RecordIsTombstone predicate. Evaluates to true if the record value is null (tombstone record).

defaultSnippets.label: RecordIsTombstone - Filter tombstone records
defaultSnippets.description: Predicate that evaluates to true for tombstone records (null values). Use with Filter transform to drop or process tombstone records separately.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**RecordIsTombstone** - Evaluates to `true` if the record value is `null` (tombstone record).

**Use case:**
- Filter out tombstone records (deletes) from your pipeline
- Process tombstone records separately from regular records
- Prevent null values from reaching downstream systems

**Example:** Use with Filter transform to drop tombstone records:
```
transforms=filterTombstones
predicates=isTombstone
predicates.isTombstone.type=org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.predicates.RecordIsTombstone
transforms.filterTombstones.type=org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.Filter
transforms.filterTombstones.predicate=isTombstone
```
